column1: # These values show lifecycle GHG emissions for a range of different photovoltaic
# technologies (both thin-film and crystalline-Si) across different regions and
# system sizes
column2: though all data are for ground-mount

column1: # Each row (excluding the data point from the IPCC) shows an average of different
# lifecycle indirect emissions estimates from several sources. The
# "Lifecycle indirect CO2 emissions per functional unit by PV type" VMA shows
# the data points from the literature that are used to calculate the averages
# seen here. See below for more detailed reference/source information for these
# entries. Each entry (except for the IPCC input) is weighted based on the total
# share of global PV production for each type of technology. These weights come
# from Fraunhofer Institute for Solar Energy Systems and Projects in Solar Energy
# SolarPVUtil VMA #20
Source ID
Average of Thin-film a-Si, ground mount
Average of Thin-film CdTe, ground-mount
Average of Thin-film CIGS, ground-mount
Average of Monocrystalline-Si, ground-mount
Average of Multicrystalline-Si, ground mount

Masanet, E., Chang, Y., Gopal, A.R., Larsen, P. Morrow III, W., Sathre, R., Shehabi, A., Zhai, P.  Life-Cycle Assessment of Electric Power Systems. Annual Review of Environment and Resources 2013 38:1, 107-136 High (PV)
